name: Snack Pack
description:
Quickly pack the correct fruit into the basket in this fast paced VR game!

The aim of the game is to put the correct snack into the basket, while not putting in the wrong one ,otherwise you fail!

This game was made in 6 hours (+ a tiny bit of debugging), for the Quarantine Game Jam.

See how I made this on my YouTube Channel!

Assets used: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/coffeeshop-starter-pack-160914
https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/food/fruit/lowpoly-fruits#
